description:
A modified browser built using Electron that helps in responsive web development.


What's Changed
- Added important devices by @Trishix in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1433
- Fixed non rotatable devices rotating when "Rotate All" button in top of GUI is pressed by @mklikushin in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1439
- fix: disable fullscreen on F while typing (#1441) by @bhnprksh222 in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1454
- feat: Add design overlay functionality by @sayagodev in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1460
- Disable angular extension as it doesn't work well right now by @manojVivek in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1467
New Contributors
- @mklikushin made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1439
- @bhnprksh222 made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1454
- @sayagodev made their first contribution in https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/pull/1460
Full Changelog: https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app/compare/v1.17.1...v1.18.0
